Description: Created to celebrate the 100th birthday of Les Paul. A beautiful guitar in every way. Condition is almost mint. There are a few scuffs, not scratches, as if from a capo on the lower back of the neck. I did my best to get a photo and I outlined the area. They are shallow and I could remove them with some swril removal cream and may still do that. I purchased a new case for this guitar and as you can see by the lack of string impressions on the plush lining that this is the first guitar in it. Zero Fret Nut - Patent applied for nut with adjustable actionWider neck and fingerboard (.050 per side) for increased playing comfortTune-o-matic bridge featuring hex wrench adjustment on thumbscrews for easy action adjustmentsProfessional setup - Accurate intonation, PLEK program, 27% lower fretwireSmoother sanded/buffed fingerboard with oil treatmentOne-piece thicker rosewood fingerboardPearl inlays More robust cables change from 28 AWG to 26 AWG for improved signalImproved jack design for uninterrupted signalGloss lacquerHardshell case Body: MahoganyNeck: Maple Slim ProfileFingerboard: 24-fret rosewood, with pearl dotsHardware: Satin nickel tune-o-matic and stop barFinish: Gloss lacquerElectronics: 61 tribute Zebra pickupsPlastics: Black top hats, Dark Cream ringsI usually ship within 24 hours.PLEASE REVIEW THE OTHER LISTINGS FROM MY LARGE COLLECTION.
Title: 2015 Gibson SG Les Paul 100 Special with New Hardshell Case
